short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add easy access to blocking and muting users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make it super easy to block or mute users from your timeline with a click of a button without having to go through menus and confirmation dialogs
https://github.com/bezalel6/XQuickBlock
